# Web3 Campus Resources Dashboard

## Project Type
Next.js 14+ TypeScript application with Web3 integration

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Chakra UI (responsive design)
- Wagmi (wallet hooks)
- Viem (Ethereum interactions)

## Project Structure
- `/components` - Reusable UI components (Header, Sidebar, ResourceCard)
- `/app` - Next.js app router pages
- `/styles` - Global styles and theme configuration
- `/utils` - Utility functions and helpers
- `/config` - Web3 configuration (Wagmi setup)

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all files
- Follow responsive design principles with Chakra UI
- Include comprehensive code comments
- Document all component interfaces
- Use Web3 hooks from Wagmi for wallet interactions
